book.synopsis: Managers do the right things; leaders do things right. According to Dr. Bennis, strong, forceful leadership is what industry needs to be successful. In this program he describes how successful leaders deploy self-management to inspire and bring out the best in other people, and presents a leadership challenge to all who listen. He also shows how to think like an entrepreneur for effective leadership. Bennis has authored more than 15 business books.
book.title_long: The Leadership Challenge: Skills for Taking Charge
book.dimensions: Height: 4.25 Inches, Length: 2.75 Inches, Width: 0.5 Inches
